Wizard.task_description: Help the user find a specific apartment. (You can find the video tutorial under @wizard-tutorial-url, in case you want to watch it again.)
completion_requirements: You have found an apartment that the user likes,
completion_questions: ...change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
...become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue?
